overview: You don’t need to be an expert in the sacrament of absolution to enjoy this superb escapade. All you need is an appreciation of hot male muscle, meaty uncut cocks and oodles of hot jizz – all of which is on display big-time at the sexiest seminary in the Czech Republic. This is one group of spiritual warriors that’s primed and ready to face the daily onslaught of the sins of the flesh. Lucky bastards!!
title: Priest Absolution
